user_profile.name: Amina Al-Hamadi
user_profile.description: Amina Al-Hamadi is a 68-year-old retired professor from a well-respected university in her Middle Eastern country. With expert-level tech experience, she approaches her challenges with an analytical mindset, preferring formal and detailed communication despite her very reserved nature. Currently, due to limited mobility, Amina seeks to arrange urgent transportation to a clinic for a routine check-up, displaying her adaptability and patient demeanor while managing the complexities of her health.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Emergency transport to clinic for unplanned visits
Scheduled transportation for physical therapy sessions
task_specific_attributes.timeline: Immediate arrangement required within the next hour
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online through transportation service apps or phone call to local services
additional_requirements: Assistance with getting in and out of the vehicle
Provision for a caregiver to accompany during the ride
Availability of a vehicle with wheelchair access

examples: I need a smartphone with a good camera and decent battery life. Something reliable for everyday use.
Looking for a gaming laptop that can handle new releases. I'd prefer something with a good display.
Can you recommend a home security system? We have a medium-sized house and would need outdoor coverage.
